ai-mn149:0.2_0: The Great Discourse on the Six Sense Fields
ai-mn149:1.2_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
ai-mn149:2.1_0: “Mendicants, I shall teach you the great discourse on the six sense fields.
ai-mn149:2.2_0: listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
ai-mn149:3.1_0: “Mendicants, when you don’t truly know and see the eye, sights, eye consciousness, eye contact, and what is felt as pleasant, painful, or neutral that arises conditioned by eye contact, you’re aroused by desire for these things.
ai-mn149:3.2_0: As they meditate observing an aspect of the gratification, drawback, and escape regarding the five grasping aggregates, they go beyond the five grasping aggregates.
ai-mn149:3.3_0: And their craving grows and grows.
ai-mn149:3.4_0: Their physical and mental stresses grow,
ai-mn149:3.7_0: And they experience pain and sadness because of the body.
ai-mn149:4-7.1_0: When you don’t truly know and see the ear ...
ai-mn149:4-7.3_0: I truly understood the ear ... nose ... tongue ... body ...
ai-mn149:4-7.4_0: One who does not truly know or see the body ...
ai-mn149:4-7.5_0: mind, thoughts, mind consciousness, mind contact, and what is felt as pleasant, painful, or neutral that arises conditioned by mind contact, you’re aroused by desire for these things.
ai-mn149:8.1_0: As they meditate observing an aspect of the gratification, drawback, and escape regarding the five grasping aggregates, they go beyond the five grasping aggregates.
ai-mn149:8.2_0: And their craving grows and grows.
ai-mn149:8.3_0: Their physical and mental stresses grow,
ai-mn149:8.6_0: And they experience pain and sadness because of the body.
ai-mn149:9.1_0: When you do truly know and see the eye, sights, eye consciousness, eye contact, and what is felt as pleasant, painful, or neutral that arises conditioned by eye contact, you’re not aroused by desire for these things.
ai-mn149:9.2_0: Someone who lives unaroused like this—unfettered, unconfused, concentrating on drawbacks—disperses the the five grasping aggregates for themselves in the future.
ai-mn149:9.3_0: And their craving—which leads to future rebirth, mixed up with relishing and greed, looking for enjoyment in various different realms—is given up.
ai-mn149:9.7_0: And they experience physical and mental pleasure.
ai-mn149:10.1_0: The view of such a person is right view.
ai-mn149:10.5_0: and their immersion is right immersion.
ai-mn149:10.6_0: And their actions of body and speech have already been fully purified before.
ai-mn149:10.7_0: So this noble eightfold path is fully developed.
ai-mn149:10.8_0: When the noble eightfold path is developed, the following are fully developed: the four kinds of mindfulness meditation, the four right efforts, the four bases of psychic power, the five faculties, the five powers, and the seven awakening factors.
ai-mn149:10.9_0: And these two qualities proceed in conjunction:
ai-mn149:10.11_0: They completely understand by direct knowledge those things that should be completely understood by direct knowledge.
ai-mn149:10.12_0: They give up by direct knowledge those things that should be given up by direct knowledge.
ai-mn149:10.13_0: They develop by direct knowledge those things that should be developed by direct knowledge.
ai-mn149:10.14_0: They realize by direct knowledge those things that should be realized by direct knowledge.
ai-mn149:11.1_0: And what are the things that should be completely understood by direct knowledge?
ai-mn149:11.2_0: You should say: ‘The five grasping aggregates.’
ai-mn149:11.3_0: The grasping aggregates of form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-mn149:11.4_0: These are the things that should be completely understood by direct knowledge.
ai-mn149:11.5_0: And what are the things that should be given up by direct knowledge?
ai-mn149:11.6_0: Ignorance and craving for continued existence.
ai-mn149:11.7_0: These are the things that should be given up by direct knowledge.
ai-mn149:11.8_0: And what are the things that should be developed by direct knowledge?
ai-mn149:11.10_0: These are the things that should be developed by direct knowledge.
ai-mn149:11.11_0: And what are the things that should be realized by direct knowledge?
ai-mn149:11.13_0: These are the things that should be realized by direct knowledge.
ai-mn149:12-18.1_0: When you truly know and see the ear ...
ai-mn149:12-18.5_0: mind, thoughts, mind consciousness, mind contact, and what is felt as pleasant, painful, or neutral that arises conditioned by mind contact, you are not aroused by desire for these things. ...
ai-mn149:19.1_0: Someone who lives unaroused like this—unfettered, unconfused, concentrating on drawbacks—disperses the the five grasping aggregates for themselves in the future.
ai-mn149:19.2_0: And their craving—which leads to future rebirth, mixed up with relishing and greed, looking for enjoyment in various different realms—is given up.
ai-mn149:19.6_0: And they experience physical and mental pleasure.
ai-mn149:20.1_0: The view of such a person is right view.
ai-mn149:20.5_0: and their immersion is right immersion.
ai-mn149:20.6_0: And their actions of body and speech have already been fully purified before.
ai-mn149:20.7_0: So this noble eightfold path is fully developed.
ai-mn149:21.1_0: When the noble eightfold path is developed, the following are fully developed: the four kinds of mindfulness meditation, the four right efforts, the four bases of psychic power, the five faculties, the five powers, and the seven awakening factors.
ai-mn149:22.1_0: And these two qualities proceed in conjunction:
ai-mn149:22.3_0: They completely understand by direct knowledge those things that should be completely understood by direct knowledge.
ai-mn149:22.4_0: They give up by direct knowledge those things that should be given up by direct knowledge.
ai-mn149:22.5_0: They develop by direct knowledge those things that should be developed by direct knowledge.
ai-mn149:22.6_0: They realize by direct knowledge those things that should be realized by direct knowledge.
ai-mn149:23.1_0: And what are the things that should be completely understood by direct knowledge?
ai-mn149:23.2_0: You should say: ‘The five grasping aggregates’.
ai-mn149:23.3_0: form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-mn149:23.4_0: These are the things that should be completely understood by direct knowledge.
ai-mn149:24.1_0: And what are the things that should be given up by direct knowledge?
ai-mn149:24.2_0: Ignorance and craving for continued existence.
ai-mn149:24.3_0: These are the things that should be given up by direct knowledge.
ai-mn149:25.1_0: And what are the things that should be developed by direct knowledge?
ai-mn149:25.3_0: These are the things that should be developed by direct knowledge.
ai-mn149:26.1_0: And what are the things that should be realized by direct knowledge?
ai-mn149:26.3_0: These are the things that should be realized by direct knowledge.”
ai-mn149:26.4_0: This is what the Buddha said.
ai-mn149:26.5_0: Satisfied, the mendicants were happy with what the Buddha said.
ai-mn149:26.6_0: The seventh section on the six sense fields is finished.
